name: Bear with it!
description:
Play as a teddy bear who must escape their home that has been has filled with lava!

Bear with it! is a first person platformer game for PC.

You will escape multiple rooms in your home that are filled with lava by jumping on objects that have not sunk. 

This game was created for AIE's "Battle for Train Jam" over 48 hours. 

Programmer: 

  • Josh Livingston

Game Designers:

  • Trent Wood
  • Jeff Cartwright

Artists:

  • Jennamarie Hunter
  • Megan Bahtijaragic
  • Xan Farley (Lava Specialist)

How to play:

  • WASA to move
  • Space bar to jump
  • Mouse to look around

PC Specs:

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities 
  • CPU: SSE2 instruction 

Brought to you by RAG Productions!
